title: For this purpose, ―carpet area‖ as per (i) and (ii) above means the net usable floor area within a tenement excluding that covered by the walls or any other areas specifically exempted from floor space index computation as per prevailing Regulation
clause_text: For this purpose, ―carpet area‖ as per (i) and (ii) above means the net usable floor area within a tenement excluding that covered by the walls or any other areas specifically exempted from floor space index computation as per prevailing Regulation.
section: Commercial / Office / Shop / Economic Activity Free of Cost

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
